<template>
  <van-notice-bar left-icon="volume-o" :scrollable="false">
  <van-swipe
    vertical
    class="notice-swipe"
    :autoplay="3000"
    :show-indicators="false"
  >
    <van-swipe-item>内容 1</van-swipe-item>
    <van-swipe-item>内容 2</van-swipe-item>
    <van-swipe-item>内容 3</van-swipe-item>
  </van-swipe>
</van-notice-bar>
</template>

<script>
export default {

}
</script>

<style>
.van-notice-bar {
  height: 30vh;
}
 .notice-swipe {
    height: 40px;
    line-height: 40px;
  }
</style>
